allPosts.title: Introduction to Docker
allPosts.excerpt: This is a quick article to share a presentation I've made months ago to introduce Docker to my colleagues. The text is in french, but slides are very graphical so you will have no problems to understand.

allPosts.title: Debug a React Native application with ease
allPosts.excerpt: Debugging on React Native is not as ease as we think. Facebook officially provides documentation on debugging a RN application in Google Chrome taking advantages of Chrome Developer Tools.

allPosts.title: My first electron app : Blinker
allPosts.excerpt: A week ago, I discovered a very useful website and I thought I should make it an application. The principle is simple : it reminds you to take your eyes away from your computer every 20 minutes. So here is Blinker.
